entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Salaberry-de-Valleyfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: ENE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
